name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.17.0-70ac5db9bd24b9b31ec6024de6a8053784a0db53 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
